Pager

Use the pager component to show the number of available pages, highlight the current page (range) and add previous/next buttons for navigation.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-pager

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-pager

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-pager/src/scss/pager";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Pager

The pager is positioned left by default. Reposition the pager at another breakpoint by adding the vl-pager--align-[left,center,right]--[m,s,xs] class.

  • Rij 11-20 van 600
  • Vorige 10 rijen
  • Volgende 10 rijen 
      
  <div class="vl-pager">
    <ul class="vl-pager__list">
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Rij</span>
        <strong>11-20</strong> van 600
      </li>
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <a href="#" class="vl-pager__element__cta vl-link vl-link--bold">
          <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-left-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
          Vorige<span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> 10 rijen</span>
        </a>
      </li>
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <a href="#" class="vl-pager__element__cta vl-link vl-link--bold">Volgende
          <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> 10 rijen</span>
          <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </a>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>

Pager center

Pager aligned to the center in the parent container

  • Rij 11-20 van 600
  • Vorige 10 rijen
  • Volgende 10 rijen 
      
  <div class="vl-pager vl-pager--align-center">
    <ul class="vl-pager__list">
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Rij</span>
        <strong>11-20</strong> van 600
      </li>
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <a href="#" class="vl-pager__element__cta vl-link vl-link--bold">
          <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-left-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
          Vorige<span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> 10 rijen</span>
        </a>
      </li>
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <a href="#" class="vl-pager__element__cta vl-link vl-link--bold">Volgende
          <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> 10 rijen</span>
          <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </a>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>

Pager right

Pager aligned to the right in the parent container

  • Rij 11-20 van 600
  • Vorige 10 rijen
  • Volgende 10 rijen 
      
  <div class="vl-pager vl-pager--align-right">
    <ul class="vl-pager__list">
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden">Rij</span>
        <strong>11-20</strong> van 600
      </li>
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <a href="#" class="vl-pager__element__cta vl-link vl-link--bold">
          <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-left-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
          Vorige<span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> 10 rijen</span>
        </a>
      </li>
      <li class="vl-pager__element">
        <a href="#" class="vl-pager__element__cta vl-link vl-link--bold">Volgende
          <span class="vl-u-visually-hidden"> 10 rijen</span>
          <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </a>
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
